description: Certificate of lawfulness for the erection of a boundary wall and conversion of hardstanding to amenity space to facilitate use of retail unit as a day care nursery, installation of cycle store and associated alterations
decision_conditions: The proposed boundary wall with a metal grill above would have a total height of approximately 1.5 metres and as such, this requires planning permission.
Given that condition 11 (cycle storage) of P0303.19 has not been discharged and flats do not have permitted development rights, the proposed cycle storage requires planning permission.
It is noted that the entire site has been outlined in red on the Location Plan. In the event of a resubmission, the site location plan should show the retail unit within the site outlined in red.
It is noted that the drawing number is missing from the Proposed Plans (Proposed Floor Plan and Proposed Basement Floor Plan) and this should be rectified in the event of a resubmission.
